item.description: Accommodations There are plenty of hotels, B&Bs, camping areas, and vacation apartments in Pinerolo and its’ surroundings - we’ve got a few of them listed here below: Hotels Hotel Cavalieri, Str.le Orbassano 21, 10064 Pinerolo, Italy Camping Camping Pino Blu, Viale I Maggio 17, Villar Pellice, Italy Many other accommodations are available on the booking.com page dedicated to Pinerolo

Schedule and Locations Friday, September 9th 4:00 pm Wedding ceremony From 6:00 pm on Reception, Dinner, and Party at “Tenuta Suffolk” Saturday, September 10th Saturday morning at your disposal 2:30 pm (Meeting Point in Turin TBD) Guided tour of Turin for everybody interested and back on track ;-) 6:30 pm For anyone who is still hungry, a little BBQ in Villafranca at Alex’s parents’ place Locations

When Friday, Sep 9 - Saturday, Sep 10 - 2022 Please RSVP no later than August 15th. The Church The wedding ceremony will take place at the Catholic church of San Maurizio in Pinerolo. Location: Piazzale S. Maurizio 2, 10064 Pinerolo (TO), Italia The Venue The wedding reception will be held at Tenuta Suffolk in Roletto, following the ceremony at church. Weather Check the weather in Pinerolo. Dress Code We are happy if youâ€™re coming - no matter what you wear :-).
